content:
inspired by - https://twitter.com/molly_struve/status/1453046960009658370

That would be game over for me https://twitter.com/molly_struve/status/1453046960009658370/photo/1

- Molly Struve ðŸ¦„ (@molly_struve)

For your next game you must compose a FHIR Path from memory and have it work on the first try.
Or you can just kill all the FHIR designers and implementers and save time
For your next game you must compose a FHIR profile slice from memory and have it work on the first try.
For your next game find a useful implementation of bulk FHIR
For your next game convert CCDA to FHIR
For your next game fix the Subscription resource
I'll sign up for the last one! =)
For your next game, write a working TestScript by hand and have a TestScript engine execute it.
Ooh, that was one of my favorites as a kid @Jason Walonoski !
quietly calls Child Welfare about Josh's upbringing
For your next game, you must write an IG without any warnings and errors on the first try
now that is just not fair... it is hard to do that on the 20th time.
Can it be a text only IG with no artifacts?
If it is text only you must have a correct history page with no bad links
Ha - a fool's errand! I posit that it is impossible to sort out what Jira artifacts are needed to allow it to pass without having run it first =).
Jens is just trying to kill of all known IG developers and guarantee himself a job for life

Can it be a text only IG with no artifacts?

No, because that will cause an error :laughing:
